original_title: Flat Earth: To the Edge and Back
overview: When Logan Paul's fifth friend Mike Maljeek drops a bombshell about his Flat Earth beliefs, Logan and the team strap on their tin foil hats and embark on a journey to find the truth, follow along as they spiral down the two-dimensional rabbit hole, meeting colorful characters and confronting outrageous theories.
tagline: Beyond the horizon lies a world of belief and disbelief...
title: Flat Earth: To the Edge and Back
